name: Interplanetary Criminal
description:
'''Zachary Bruce''' (born 1993), known professionally as '''Interplanetary Criminal''', is a British musician and [[Disc jockey|DJ]].

He rose to international prominence following the release of the 2022 single "[[B.O.T.A. (Baddest of Them All)]]" with [[Eliza Rose]], which reached number one on the [[UK singles chart|UK Singles Chart]] and was certified 2Ã— platinum.
